body.p:
This week's issue of the Gentoo Weekly Newsletter has been released. This edition brings news about the Gentoo Linux project at LinuxWorld Expo, an update about the 1.4 release status, details about a new kernel development strategy and the proposal of a new release schedule framework for future versions of Gentoo Linux. Additionally, you can read about the latest news on Gentoo Linux security, Portage Watch and a summary of items heard in the community. Finally, our list of international versions continues to grow, with translations now offered in
French, Italian, Portuguese (Brazil), Portuguese (Portugal) and Spanish.
